use_cases_desc:
- Tangible Interaction in the Museum
- Augmented Reality Interfaces for Smart Things (augmenting physical devices with functionality via AR)
- Smartphone Notifications Displayed in the Environment
contribution_desc:
The poster introduces the meSchup IoT platform, which enables developers and designers to programm and use actuators and sensors using a single scripting language (JavaScript), which is access in a web-based IDE. Special Smart Space Hubs connect and control the IoT devices. 

The devices can connect and communicate with each other via the Smart Space Hubs.
use_cases: Museums; AR for Smart Things; Notifications management
additional_hardware: Smart Space Hub (Raspberry Pi with multiple communication technology adapters)
